official_title: A bill to establish a program to promote the utilization of spinoffs from space technology in meeting the needs and alleviating the suffering of the elderly.
short_title: Space Technology for the Elderly Act

summary.text: Space Technology for the Elderly Act - Establishes a program within the National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) to develop devices and strategies to meet the special needs and alleviate the suffering of the elderly by the use of innovative technologies derived from NASA's space and energy research and development. Authorizes appropriations for such purpose. Directs the Administrator of NASA: (1) to administer this Act; (2) to report to Congress; and (3) to publish a catalog of such devices and strategies.
